snippet.title: exA-Arcadia『怒首領蜂最大往生 EXA LABEL』| DODONPACHI TRUE DEATH EXA LABEL for Arcades | Attract Video
snippet.description:
DODONPACHI TRUE DEATH EXA LABEL for Arcades on exA-Arcadia
Available Now

Players: 1-2
Genre: Shooter
Monitor: Vertical (Recommended), Horizontal
Languages: English, Japanese, French, Spanish

FEATURES

4 PLAYABLE SHIPS
Now you can choose from all 4 characters including Type D - Saya!

4 PLAY MODES
ORIGINAL MODE - an improved port of the original game featuring toggleable bug fixes for score overflow and hit box issues & gameplay improvements supervised by super player Peke
EXA LABEL MODE - a brand new modern version of the game focused on bullet canceling and hyper usage
X ARRANGE MODE - a new intepretation of the 360 arranged mode featuring less talking and more shooting
INBACHI MODE - play against the legendary boss with full resources

Every ship type are available play to in each game mode.

GADGETS
In either screen orientation (vertical or horizontal), newly designed gadgets can be toggled and repositioned as desired

1 FRAME INPUT LAG RESPONSE - twice as fast as the arcade version and 5 times faster than any home version
Maximum Performance! Play like you’re meant to. Never get hit again.

2 SOUNDTRACKS
ORIGINAL - the arcade original soundtrack by Manabu Namiki now upgraded to be in HD stereo
ARRANGED - the fully arranged soundtrack by Yoshimi Kudo

COMPLETELY VOICED
Every character and story sequence is fully voiced by renowned anime voice actors!

CAST
SHURI - YUKANA
HIKARI - ERI KITAMURA
MARIA - MAMIKO NOTO
SAYA - AYA HIRANO
HINA - AOI YUKI
OPERATOR - ASAMI SHIMODA

LEARN MORE ➡️ https://bit.ly/3pBlgSc
SUBSCRIBE ➡️ https://www.youtube.com/@exa-arcadia?view_as=subscriber?Sub_Confirmation=1 


アミューズメント施設向けexA-Arcadia専用
縦スクロールシューティング
『怒首領蜂最大往生 EXA LABEL』
絶賛稼働中

詳しくはこちら ➡️ https://bit.ly/3pBl9Gg
チャンネル登録 ➡️ https://www.youtube.com/@exa-arcadia?view_as=subscriber?Sub_Confirmation=1 


About exA-Arcadia:
exA-Arcadia is the worldwide leading manufacturer of arcade joystick video games with over 40 high quality titles available now covering popular genres such as fighters, beat'em ups, action and shooters. 

NEVER SETTLE
DEMAND THE BEST
POWER TO THE EXA
